content.raw:
Not sure if it is related, but `CMAKE_DL_LIBS` is empty on Windows, as the `dlfcn.h` is not provided by any system library, but rather by the [`dlfcn-win32`](https://github.com/dlfcn-win32/dlfcn-win32) library. 
If you are using a recent version of dlfcn-win32, you can just search for its CMake package and link its imported target (see https://github.com/dlfcn-win32/dlfcn-win32/pull/40/files). Otherwise it seems that currently it is searched in #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/annotate/b6e82be45de9134d69ee9ad9ae5f4a50aaed7d10/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake?at=FixWindows_tolower&fileviewer=file-view-default#SearchForStuff.cmake-86 .
